channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: The Case of the Duelling Pistols
item.author: A Dixon Hawke Mystery
item.description: “I didn’t kill him, Mr. Hawke! I swear I didn’t kill him!” The famous criminologist had been called to the jail by the personal appeal of the prisoner, who was well known to him.
